scripts.lintdiff: git diff --name-only --cached --relative | grep '\.js$' | xargs standard | snazzy
scripts.clean: rm -rf $TMPDIR/react-* && watchman watch-del-all && npm cache clean
scripts.clean:android: cd android/ && ./gradlew clean && cd .. && react-native run-android
scripts.newclear: rm -rf $TMPDIR/react-* && watchman watch-del-all && rm -rf ios/build/ModuleCache/* && rm -rf node_modules/ && npm cache clean && npm i
scripts.coverage: nyc ava && nyc report --reporter=html && open coverage/index.html || xdg-open coverage/index.html
scripts.android:shake: $ANDROID_HOME/platform-tools/adb devices | grep '\t' | awk '{print $1}' | sed 's/\s//g' | xargs -I {} $ANDROID_HOME/platform-tools/adb -s {} shell input keyevent 82
scripts.build:ios: cd ios && xcodebuild build -project example.xcodeproj -scheme example -sdk iphonesimulator ONLY_ACTIVE_ARCH=NO OTHER_LDFLAGS='$(inherited) -ObjC -lc++' -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone 6' -configuration Release -derivedDataPath build
